inclusion.criterion: Mayo clinic ulcerative colitits disease activity score of 6 or greater
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: concurrent therapies with mesalamine, immunomodulators, corticosteroids and biologic agents
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: severe immunosuppression (absolute neutrophil count < 1000 or CD4 count <200)
exclusion.label: triggers
not_met
exclusion.evidence: stool samples must were positive for Clostridium difficile toxin

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old woman with recent history of aspiration pneumonia and symptoms of abdominal pain, diarrhea, fever, tachycardia, and hypotension.
